title: Study of a Seated Man
provenance_text:
Jean Baptiste Pater [1695-1736]. Pierre Filloeul? [1696-1754?], by 1739 [1]. Filloeul sale, in 1739. Sold to M. Massal de St. Hubert, January 17, 1774 until 1783, no. 40 [2]. Vente de St. Hubert sale, in 1783; Vente Veri sale, December 12, 1785. M. Chevalier, December 12, 1785. sale, Paris, May 17, 1907. (Sold at Hotel Drouot, Paris, on December 19, 1941, no. 67) [3]; (sold at Seiferheld and Company, New York, NY, by 1970); purchased by Museum, May 1970. 
NOTES:1. This is likely Pierre Filloeul. 2. See correspondence from Seiferheld and Co. in curatorial file. 3. See correspondence from Seiferheld and Co. from April 1, 1970.

creator.death_place: Paris (Ville de Paris department, ÃŽle-de-France, France)
